title: Luxury Villa Getaway Near the Iconic Borobudur Temple
description: Picture this: waking up in your own private villa, taking in stunning views of lush tropical forests and an ancient Buddhist temple, spending your days feasting on fabulous meals, practising yoga and meditation, treating yourself in the spa and living in blissful relaxation. Make that dream a reality with an incredible getaway at Plataran Borobudur Resort & Spa, overlooking the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Borobudur Temple, where you will enjoy two decadent dining experiences, daily à la carte breakfast, daily afternoon tea, a one time 30% spa discount, one-way transfer from Yogyakarta airport and much more.
offer_address: Dusun Tanjungan, Borobudur, Dusun II, Borobudur, Kec. Borobudur, Magelang, Jawa Tengah 56553, Indonesia

title: Five-Star Villa Hidden in Central Java Coffee Plantation
description: Set within a charming coffee plantation and surrounded by eight rugged mountains, the multi-award-winning MesaStila Resort & Spa is the ideal place to treat yourself to a java-filled romantic couples' escape - with family upgrades available. Enjoy daily à la carte breakfast, afternoon tea, free-flow coffee, a set-menu lunch, an indulgent 60-minute Javanese massage with a coffee plantation tour, free bicycle rental and return airport transfers.
offer_address: Jl. Losari, Rw.3, Losari, Kec. Grabag, Magelang, Jawa Tengah 56196, Indonesia
